queryMap.query: SELECT /* tbee_racer_sanc_fb001 */ TRS .SANC_ISSUE_NO -- 발급번호 , TRS .SANC_BASIS_CD -- 양정코드 , '출전정지 ' || TRS .SANC_TERM || (SELECT CD_NM FROM TBEA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = 'E00116' AND CD = TRS .UNIT) SANC_TERM -- 제제처분기간 , TRS .SANC_RSN_CD -- 사유코드 , TRS .SANC_RSN -- 사유 , TRS .SANC_ACT_DT -- 처분일자 , TRS .SANC_OBJECTION -- 이의신청 , TRS .UNIT -- 제재처분단위 , TRS .HOMEPAGE_NOTI_SDT -- 공지시작일 , TRS .HOMEPAGE_NOTI_EDT -- 공지종료일 , TRS .SMRY -- 관련근거 , (SELECT TRNG_EXPT_SEQ FROM TBEB_TRNG_EXPT_RACER A WHERE A.SANC_ISSUE_NO = TRS.SANC_ISSUE_NO) AS TRNG_EXPT_SEQ FROM TBEE_RACER_SANC TRS WHERE TRS .SANC_ISSUE_NO = ?
